attributes.action: Stop the law being brought in only allowing the sale off 10 vape liquids in may.
attributes.background: I would like action because i think the new law is not rite also it will affect the vape industry and also vape shop owners and also members off the public who choice to vape instead off smokeing fags witch has far more health risks to what vape juices do and this has bin scientifically proven.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
